but you know I have seen that where some people who go 
ghost hunting..are =
so quick to say "Mg it's a demon" that's funny lol...I don't know if it's b=
ecause they are trying to make a name for themselves or just plan stupid

-=

oh dear god, there are actually people who intentionally see=
k out demons???? wait, aren't they called satanists? I think there should b=
e like a universal rule in paranormal investigation against intentionally t=
rying to seek that out. Who in their right mind, willing to believe that th=
e other side exists, would intentionally seek out its darkest most negative=
 aspects???? 

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "purplespacefriend" <purplea=
liengirl@...> wrote:
>
> I seem to run into moslty the ones that are after =
domons and the darkest crap they can dig up. 
> 
> F-S

> --- In EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com, Ursula Kalin <kalinu@> wrote:

re=C3=82=C2=A0in a group are not in it to be scared..Like you Adriana=C3=82=
=C2=A0they looking for proof of some kind..I'm a founder of a group..but I =
don't go ghost hunting..lol I don't have to,=C3=82=C2=A0 I understand that =
some people are still looking for personal reasons or just being curious...=
I don't have my group paying for places we go..unless its like a very hot s=
pot such as Mansfield which we are going in April but most places we go we =
are invited free of charge..we were just at a "haunted hotel" for free.

ted to be scared. That was never my intention when I joined a ghosthunting =
group. I just wanted to make contact with something other than physical hum=
an. And I definitely got to, even felt what was apparently a ghost (the tin=
gling feeling in the air). And I was happy, and it felt peaceful. I think I=
'd be equally happy to meet a space alien coming out of a spaceship. As lon=
g as they didn't laser beam me when I go to hug them. :)
> > 
> > --- In EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Adriana Jones" <adrianamjones@> wrote:
> > >
> > > =
Agreed. I was introduced to the ghost box at a paranormal group meeting, bu=
t ever since then the vast majority of my sessions have been at home. I wen=
t to a few cemeteries at midnight at first, but that quickly wore off when =
I realized that I get equal, and even better, communication, just sitting a=
t the dining room table.
> > > 
> > > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "purp=
lespacefriend" <purplealiengirl@> wrote:
> > > >
> > > > My approach to EVP=
 and ITC is for spirit communcation not associated with supposed hauntings.=
 That's why I find it frustrating that most insist on running aorund in the=
 dark to get evidence and EVP when they could stay home and get much more. =
Spirits and entities travel, even the ones that are supposedly stuck will c=
ome to you if asked. I don't like the Halloween, and fear crap. I think mos=
t just want to be frightened, so they pay gigabucks to go the haunted hot s=
pots hoping beyond hope to get scared out their wits by imaginary demons.
